law.catch_line: Disposition of land in custody of state agency.
law.text: In any case where the real property that is proposed to be sold pursuant to KRS 56.463 is in the custody of a state agency, the cabinet may submit to such agency a general description of the intended use of the land, along with such detailed information as the agency may require, but the finding of the cabinet on the question of selling and conveying the real property shall be final. Disposition shall be made in accordance with KRS 45A.045.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 32, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 2. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 2.
